trans-unit.source: Specifies a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> as the parameter to be used for hit testing of a visual object.
trans-unit.target: Specifica una struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> come parametro da utilizzare per l'hit testing di un oggetto visivo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters> class is for discrete coordinate hit testing, such as might be returned by a device.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters> classe viene discreti hit testing di coordinate, ad esempio potrebbe essere restituito da un dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: You can also hit test with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters> object.
trans-unit.target: Ãˆ inoltre possibile hit test con un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> creando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The parameter that is specified as the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters" /> class, using a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters" /> utilizzando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to invoke <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters> value.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come richiamare <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A> utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters> valore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> against which to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> su cui eseguire l'hit test.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> against which to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> su cui eseguire l'hit test.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override default hit test support in a user-defined visual object.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come eseguire l'override predefinito supporto di hit test in un oggetto visivo definito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters.HitPoint%2A> value is simply returned as part of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters.HitPoint%2A> viene semplicemente restituito come parte di <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>.
